Hey There!

I’m Omotayo

I am a full-stack developer, renewable energy enthusiast, a husband, and an engineer. I am passionate about providing innovative solutions for the world. If our visions align, kindly reach out to me, as I would be more than excited to work with you.

Hire Me Download CV

About Me

I am a dedicated full-stack developer, continuously driven by the desire to conceive and implement innovative solutions that foster business growth.

As my journey as a developer has unfolded, I have actively participated in projects and collaborated with fellow developers to produce functional applications. My contributions have centered on crafting code that not only achieves its immediate purpose but also remains maintainable and comprehensible. This dedication to producing solutions that stand the test of time underscores my commitment to the craft of software development.

Additionally, I have consistently nurtured my technical and professional acumen by remaining abreast of the latest technologies. My proactive engagement includes participating in bootcamps and attending tech summits, which have further enriched my skill set and deepened my understanding of industry trends

In my free time, I learn how to optimize hybrid systems using HOMER software, read about the latest breakthrough in the renewable energy space, and watch educative documentaries.

My projects

My recent Works

I like to stay busy and always have a project in the works. Take a look at some of the applications I've have built

01

Laptop Rental

Laptop app is a full-stack app created to assist users in borrowing laptops from a store. It allows laptops to be added and deleted from the store in real time.

  • React Js
  • Rails
  • Saas
  • React Hook Form
  • Live Site →
  • Github →

02

World Population App

According to the restcountries API, there are over 7.7 billion people and around 250 countries in the World. With world population App, you can have basic information of the various countries in the world with just a single click'

  • React
  • Css
  • Redux
  • Live Site →
  • Github →

03

TV Series App

This is a SPA web application built to provide users with information of various TV Series. The application allows users to post comments and like movies. The application was built using a free movie api. All changes made are preserved

  • Javascript
  • CSS
  • Html
  • Jest
  • Live Site →
  • Github →

04

BudgetIT App

BudgetIT App is a full-stack application that enables a user group planned expenses into categories. It also provides a means by which such expenses can be tracked. It was developed using rails and vanilla Css, with postgres as it database.

  • Rails
  • CSS
  • Postgres
  • Live Site →
  • Github →

05

Todo-List App

One of the ways to better manage Time and increase productivity is through Planning. Todo-List app is created just for this purpose. Tasks can be planned and tracked using this app. It also ensures that all changes made to the tasks are updated in real time and preserved.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Javascript
  • Live Site →
  • Github →

Other Noteworthy Projects

  • Space Travelers Hub

    Space travelers hub project is a web application for a company that provides commercial and scientific space travel services with the real live data from the SpaceX API. The application will allow users to book rockets and join selected space missions.

    • React js
    • Css
    • Redux

  • Book Store

    This application helps keeps track of the books in a user library. The user can add or remove books from the library. The user booklist is preserved on an API

    • React js
    • Css
    • Redux
